thread.title: Coretelligent Named to CRN Fast Growth 150 List
thread.title_full: Coretelligent Named to CRN Fast Growth 150 List

title: Coretelligent Named to CRN Fast Growth 150 List
text:
Coretelligent Named to CRN Fast Growth 150 List September 22, 2015 09:05 AM Eastern Daylight Time 
BOSTON--( BUSINESS WIRE )-- Coretelligent , the IT support and private cloud service provider of choice for small and midsized businesses, today announced that it has been named to The Channel Company’s 2015 CRN ® Fast Growth 150 list for the second consecutive year. Ranked number 55 on the list, Coretelligent is recognized as one of the fastest growing solution providers in North America. 
“Coretelligent is honored to once again make CRN’s Fast Growth 150 list,” said Kevin Routhier, Coretelligent founder and CEO. “We’ve seen increased demand for our services and proprietary solutions in recent years, and believe our success is a direct reflection of our unyielding commitment to delivering service excellence.” 
Coretelligent makes the impossible possible for companies struggling to address the broad spectrum of IT management challenges. In addition to providing complete IT support 24 hours a day, 365 days a year with 360 Support , Coretelligent’s CoreCloud enables organizations to effectively scale on demand without the capital expenditures of maintaining an on-premise IT footprint. CoreBDR adds an extra layer of data protection by safeguarding assets from data loss. 
“Cloud computing, mobile and big data technologies are making the industry both more exciting and more challenging than it’s ever been,” says Robert Faletra, CEO of The Channel Company. “Solution providers recognized in CRN’s Fast Growth 150 list are rising to meet the challenge and are thriving as a result. We are pleased to recognize these firms as leaders in today’s IT channel.” 
Coretelligent was hand-picked by CRN to appear on the Fast Growth 150 list based on its impressive revenue growth from 2012 to 2014. The Fast Growth 150 list is highlighted in CRN’s October issue and online at www.crn.com . 
About The Channel Company 
The Channel Company, with established brands including CRN ® , XChange ® Events and IPED ® , is the channel community’s trusted authority for growth and innovation. For more than three decades, we have leveraged our proven and leading-edge platforms to deliver prescriptive sales and marketing solutions for the technology channel. The Channel Company provides Communication, Recruitment, Engagement, Enablement, Demand Generation and Intelligence services to drive technology partnerships. Learn more at www.thechannelcompany.com . 
About Coretelligent 
Coretelligent is the IT support and private cloud service provider of choice for small and midsized businesses. Founded in 2006 and led by world-class experts, Coretelligent’s four key services – 360 Support, CoreCloud, CoreBDR and managed IT – are relied on by top-tier organizations in the communications, education, financial services, life sciences, retail and technology industries among others. Coretelligent and its team are recognized as leaders by the Boston Business Journal, CRN, Inc., MSPmentor, the U.S. Chamber of Commerce and others. It is headquartered in Needham, Mass., with offices in New York City, Philadelphia and the San Francisco Bay area. For more information about Coretelligent, please visit www.coretelligent.com .
